name: Feed The Forge
description:
WELCOME TO FEED THE FORGE!

This is a tower defense game made by Owen, Ryan, Quinn, Mel,  Harrison, and AJ

Make sure you don't have a controller plugged in! 

 The game looks much better on WINDOWS DOWNLAOD 

You can only place TOWERS  on the grass, and it cost 5 wood

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Left Click to Attack

Right Click to Place Towers

E to feed the main tower with wood
